title: Create IAM User Group
content:
Access to AWS Management Console
Find IAM Select IAM In the IAM Interface
Select Users Select Add users In the Details Page
For Administrator Select AWS Management Console access Select Custom password Set the password you want Uncheck User must create a new password at next sign-in Select Next: Permissions In Permissions Page
Select Add user to group Select Create group In the Create Group Interface
Enter Administrators for Group name Select AdministratorAccess Select Create group In the Add User Interface
Select Next: Tags Select Next: Review Select Create user Download access information and save it. Select Close Finish creating user and user groups.

title: Delegate access to the billing console
content:
Delegate access to the billing console AWS account owners can delegate access to specific IAM users who need to view or manage the AWS Billing and Cost Management data for an AWS account. The instructions that follow will help you set up a pretested scenario. This scenario helps you gain hands-on experience configuring billing permissions without concern for affecting your main AWS production account.
In this case, you will be logged into the root account and you want to grant billing permission to IAM Users or an IAM user group. This lab will answer questions about this section.
Content Introduction Preparation steps Enable Access Create policy Assign policy Access Test Resource Cleanup

title: Introduction
content: Giới thiệu Trong trường hợp này, bạn sẽ được đăng nhập vào tài khoản root và bạn muốn cấp quyền thanh toán cho Người dùng IAM hoặc một nhóm người dùng IAM. Thông qua bài lab này sẽ trả lời các câu hỏi về phần này.

title: Preparation
content: Preparation We need to prepare for creating an IAM user and an IAM user group, which will later be assigned access to the billing feature on AWS.

title: Enable Access
content:
Enable access Sign in to the AWS Management Console with the root account. You can choose My Account
Scroll down to IAM User and Role Access to Billing Information Select Edit In the edit interface of IAM User and Role Access to Billing Information
Select Activate IAM Access, activate access to the Billing and Cost Management console page Select Update

title: Create IAM Policy
content:
Create IAM Policy Go to AWS Management Console
In the IAM interface, select Policies Select Create policy In the Visual editor tab,
Select Choose a service Select Billing For Select actions
Select All Billing actions (aws-portal:*) Select Next: Tags Select Next: Review In the Review page,
For Name, enter BillingViewAccess Then, select Create policy

title: Assign Policy
content: Access to IAM Select Policies Select BillingFullAccess Select Actions Select Attach In the Attach Policy interface Select user Administrator Select Attach Policy

title: Access Test
content:
Check access Login to the IAM user account
Login successful.
Access to Billing successfully. So we have granted the IAM user permission to view the successful billing.

title: Clean up resources
content: Clean up resources Delete IAM User Group Access to IAM console Select User groups Select the usergroup to delete and select Delete Confirm delete usergroup.
